org.jcvlib.image

Class ColorConvert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.image.ColorConvert

  • public class ColorConvert
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods to convert images from one color scheme to another.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorConvert() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Image fromGrayToRGB(Image image)
      Convert image from Grayscale color scheme (this color scheme include only Gray color channel) to RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels).
      static Image fromHSLtoRGB(Image image)
      Convert image from HSL (same as HLS/HSI) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation and Lightness/Intensity channels) to RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels).
      static Image fromHSVtoRGB(Image image)
      Convert image from HSV (same as HSB) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation, Value (Brightness) channel) to RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels).
      static Image fromRGBtoGray(Image image)
      Convert image from RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels) to Grayscale color scheme (this color scheme include only Gray color channel).
      static Image fromRGBtoHSL(Image image)
      Convert image from RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels) to HSL (same as HLS/HSI) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation and Lightness/Intensity channels).
      static Image fromRGBtoHSV(Image image)
      Convert image from RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels) to HSV (same as HSB) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation, Value (Brightness) or Intensity channel).

    • Method Detail

      • fromRGBtoGray

        public static Image fromRGBtoGray(Image image)
        Convert image from RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels) to Grayscale color scheme (this color scheme include only Gray color channel).

        Links:
        1. Grayscale -- Wikipedia.
        2. RGB -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Image with RGB color scheme. This image should have 3 channels.
        Returns:
        Image with Grayscale color scheme. This image have 1 channel.

      • fromGrayToRGB

        public static Image fromGrayToRGB(Image image)
        Convert image from Grayscale color scheme (this color scheme include only Gray color channel) to RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels).

        Links:
        1. Grayscale -- Wikipedia.
        2. RGB -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Image with Grayscale color scheme. This image should have 1 channel.
        Returns:
        Image with RGB color scheme. This image have 3 channels.

      • fromRGBtoHSL

        public static Image fromRGBtoHSL(Image image)
        Convert image from RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels) to HSL (same as HLS/HSI) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation and Lightness/Intensity channels).

        Hue change values from interval [0.0, 360.0] of degrees, but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0]. Saturation and Lightness change values from interval [0.0, 1.0], but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0] too.

        Links:
        1. Grayscale -- Wikipedia.
        2. RGB -- Wikipedia.
        3. HSL and HSV -- Wikipedia.
        4. Grayscale -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Image with RGB color scheme. This image should have 3 channels.
        Returns:
        Image with HSL color scheme. This image have 3 channels.

      • fromHSLtoRGB

        public static Image fromHSLtoRGB(Image image)
        Convert image from HSL (same as HLS/HSI) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation and Lightness/Intensity channels) to RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels).

        Hue change values from interval [0.0, 360.0] of degrees, but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0]. Saturation and Lightness change values from interval [0.0, 1.0], but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0] too.

        Links:
        1. RGB -- Wikipedia.
        2. HSL and HSV -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Image with HSL color scheme. This image should have 3 channels.
        Returns:
        Image with RGB color scheme. This image have 3 channels.

      • fromRGBtoHSV

        public static Image fromRGBtoHSV(Image image)
        Convert image from RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels) to HSV (same as HSB) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation, Value (Brightness) or Intensity channel).

        Hue change values from interval [0.0, 360.0] of degrees, but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0]. Saturation and Value change values from interval [0.0, 1.0], but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0] too.

        Links:
        1. RGB -- Wikipedia.
        2. HSL and HSV -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Image with RGB color scheme. This image should have 3 channels.
        Returns:
        Image with HSV color scheme. This image have 3 channels.

      • fromHSVtoRGB

        public static Image fromHSVtoRGB(Image image)
        Convert image from HSV (same as HSB) color scheme (this color scheme include Hue, Saturation, Value (Brightness) channel) to RGB color scheme (this color scheme include Red, Green and Blue channels).

        Hue change values from interval [0.0, 360.0] of degrees, but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0]. Saturation and Value change values from interval [0.0, 1.0], but translated to interval [0.0, 255.0] too.

        Links:
        1. RGB -- Wikipedia.
        2. HSL and HSV -- Wikipedia.

        Parameters:
        image - Image with HSV color scheme. This image should have 3 channels.
        Returns:
        Image with RGB color scheme. This image have 3 channels.
